mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (writerId, topic, title, content, wroteAt, viewCnt, likeCnt, commentCnt) VALUES (#{writerId}, #{topic}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT no, writerId, topic, title, content, wroteAt, viewCnt, likeCnt, commentCnt FROM article ORDER BY no DESC
SELECT no, writerId, topic, title, content, wroteAt, viewCnt, likeCnt, commentCnt FROM article WHERE no = #{no}
